column3: Save the man bun, have mercy on my hair.
Life is too short to have a boring haircut.
What are the odds you won't cut my hair.
My hair is the tall grass in Pokemon.
Do what you want, what you want with my body.
Tell me my hair looks sexy pushed back.
I will fight you. Don't be surprised.
Turned bad hair day into a lifestyle.
Bet you can't make me look bad.
I don't like this kind of buzz.
Just a bit off the top.
Four score and seven beards ago.
I already did 50% of the work.
